Name: oprnamespace
Description: The OID of the namespace that contains this\n operator

Name: oprcom
Description: Commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
Description: Negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprlsortop
Description: If this operator supports merge joins, the operator\n that sorts the type of the left-hand operand (L<L)

Name: oprrsortop
Description: If this operator supports merge joins, the operator\n that sorts the type of the right-hand operand (R<R)

Name: oprltcmpop
Description: If this operator supports merge joins, the less-than\n operator that compares the left and right operand types (L<R)

Name: oprgtcmpop
Description: If this operator supports merge joins, the\n greater-than operator that compares the left and right operand types (L>R)

Name: oprrest
Description: Restriction selectivity estimation function for this\n operator

Name: oprjoin
Description: Join selectivity estimation function for this\n operator
